EmailTemplate.description: Use this template for asking the details from client for sending ASC offer to them.
EmailTemplate.name: ASC details from Client
EmailTemplate.subject: Required Details for ASC offer.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
To enable us to share the ASC offer, please let us know the following:
1. Who are You (SI/Distributor/Channel Partner)?
2. End-user name and location?
3. Name of SI/Distributor from whom the system is brought?
4. Total Number of devices:
5. Types of devices.
6. Serial Number of the Devices:
7. IXM WEB Version:
8. Machine Key from IXM WEB
· Log in to IXM WEB -> go to the admin menu ->top-right corner.
· Click on Admin Menu-> About IXM WEB
· You will find a Machine Key over there, copy that machine key, and provide it to us in text format (please do not provide these details in an image format).
